Author: mkcrom
Title: [ANN][ICO] CROM - TRANSPARENCY, TRUST AND LIQUIDITY IN PERFORMANCE MARKETING
Body: Hi all,  its time to give a update on the CROM project. First of all and most importantly, we are still serious about the project and the team is still working together. As stated in our original whitepaper, the core team has a strong background in performance marketing and is very well connected in that industry. What we currently hear from clients and partners is, that most challenges we predicted (fraudulent transaction in particular) are now starting to really have an negative impact on all parties involved. So we are more convinced than ever, that CROM must happen.  As the ICO was not successful, we spend a lot of time in the last 3 month to evaluate alternative offers to support our project. We had many valuable meetings and talks with companies, evangelists and people from the industry. Maybe this is the right way to go for us. Stay tuned for more information.  However, no matter how the final business setup will look like, technically CROM bases on blockchain. And the CROM token is an important part of how CROMhub works. Since the token is out there, we've been busy to finally make the CROM token tradable. We aimed to make an announcement about tradeability in March, but due to long approval process this will still take a bit. But its not forgotten! Join our Telegram group if you want to get in touch with the team or discuss with other CROMhub members: https://t.me/CROMhub   Thanks Matthias

Author: trCROM
Title: [ANN][ICO] CROM - TRANSPARENCY, TRUST AND LIQUIDITY IN PERFORMANCE MARKETING
Body: Good morning from Bangkok, guys.  Remaining tokens go to company wallet. We thought long about how to proceed. Burning feels right, if the token his a high-volume publicly needed token for everyone. By burning unsold tokens, one would limit supply to what demand was at the time of the ICO. But CROM is more a B2B-token, meant for businesses and companies. Most of them have not realized, that the tokens might be useful for them in the future. So demand will grow a lot once they do.  CROMhub will use unsold tokens carefully to grow adoption of the platform (= a big new client gets some tokens in the beginning to understand the functionality and then, hopefully, buy more tokens on the open market).

Title: [ANN][ICO] CROM - TRANSPARENCY, TRUST AND LIQUIDITY IN PERFORMANCE MARKETING

Title: [ANN][ICO] CROM - TRANSPARENCY, TRUST AND LIQUIDITY IN PERFORMANCE MARKETING

It's a tricky time for ICO's because the market is literally flooded with them at the moment, there is an ICO for everything nowadays.  There is a real need for CROM from digital advertisers and publishers and this is why the project will be a success. It may take a while to get off of the ground but I think we will see a lot of investments before the end of this ICO.

Author: mkcrom
Title: [ANN][ICO] CROM - TRANSPARENCY, TRUST AND LIQUIDITY IN PERFORMANCE MARKETING
Body: Hi,  you are right, the lending process lacks on details for now. The reason why we cannot share more details at this point is, that the initial token distribution is not finished yet. The general setup will probably give token owners the option to temporary lend CROM tokens on a campaign level or permanently to any party involved. How the final clearing setup (costs, revenues, volumes) will look like depends on the results of the initial token distribution, but we are already looking at different tech integration scenarios to handle the lending process.  Matthias

Author: phantam
Title: [ANN][ICO] CROM - TRANSPARENCY, TRUST AND LIQUIDITY IN PERFORMANCE MARKETING

Author: trCROM
Title: [ANN][ICO] CROM - TRANSPARENCY, TRUST AND LIQUIDITY IN PERFORMANCE MARKETING
Body: Hi guys. Bangkok is great! At the conference, we did not speak but met with a lot of influential people. Same story always: project is great, there is a real need for the solution. BUT: ICO market is though these days: too many ICOs, too many scams, BTC/ETH going strong.  Staying in Bangkok for a few more days. Tomorrow starts Affiliate World Asia - where many of our "future clients" are. Will continue talks there.  all the best, Thomas

Author: mt55
Title: [ANN][ICO] CROM - TRANSPARENCY, TRUST AND LIQUIDITY IN PERFORMANCE MARKETING
Body: Well, in a white paper they do have the possibility to demonstrate their technical and critical thinking abilities upfront I would say. It gives you a feeling whether the stuff can be realistic (if you are able to understand it). A clean website isn't just too high a barrier for scammers to overcome. Ok, you could say the same for the white paper. But if someone seriously writes a white paper which absolutely convinces you after reading and analyzing it thoroughly, then chances aren't that high those people have just written it for the lolz (again, assuming you have some background about the stuff you are reading). Responsive team is always a huge plus in my opinion, but there were ICOs where scammers turned out to be extraordinarily responsive for some time. You never know

Author: BERMUDAL
Title: [ANN][ICO] CROM - TRANSPARENCY, TRUST AND LIQUIDITY IN PERFORMANCE MARKETING
Body: Yes indeed, no matter what you would find projects could always turn out to be a scam. That's why you don't need to see whitepaper - roadmap - clean website - marketing - team all apart. I look at it as a combo, in which the whitepaper gives important information. roadmap gives the info how fast they are planning on accomplishing these task. Marketing is a pretty important thing for me.. no project will fully reach any potential if you don't market it right. And then the team, it has to be diverse and not just solely developers. Also i want links to their social media, location etc. in that case you can see if they are real persons, so profiles on social media can't be brand new --> indicator for a scam.

Eth will continue to rise, but people need to calm down when it comes to corrections, you can tell the people in this market that are new, crypto is great cause its a profitable area that can go +100% in a day, but that also means it can -100% in a day, the way the coins work and due to supply and demand, it will always fluctuate but in most cases like in bitcoin the fact supply is limited will always drive prices to an equilibrium and then higher as demand grows based on publicity and network growth.  Tokens like crom are the same they depend on getting the word out and creating usage and demand for the tokens.

Author: phantam
Title: [ANN][ICO] CROM - TRANSPARENCY, TRUST AND LIQUIDITY IN PERFORMANCE MARKETING
Body: crypto's always hectic and will probably will continue to be till bitcoin stops being 50+% of the marketshare, i'm excited to see any gain etherium/iota/dash/etc have to split the market share as it is bitcoin holds too much weight in the overall market trends...  As for crom releasing, turbulence is part of life in the market it will survive it, its just something these companies have to learn to deal with and set money aside to survive.  10000$ was a virtual limit a very big one that people used to trigger a massive pump and dump, i mean seriously no one saw this coming after btc hit the magical 10000 and suddenly out of no where jumped another 1500$ in one day? of course it was going to correct it was the most obvious pump and dump ever on a huge scale.  We're back to where most people naturally thought bitcoin would be at this point... As for the other coins that also dropped thats because btc market share is so high any change in it tends to flow across the others as btc is the standard for currency transactions, most people trade in and out via btc most prices are marked against bitcoin due to its market share... just like most currencies are marked against USD so if USD takes a hit the whole world tends to feel the impact.  When bitcoin does well its a good sign for the market when it takes a hit so do the others atleast in the short term... Thats why its so important to try to spread the popularity to new coins/tokens and platforms to diversify the marketshare percentages to get bitcoin from 55% down to maybe 20-25% over time

Author: phantam
Title: [ANN][ICO] CROM - TRANSPARENCY, TRUST AND LIQUIDITY IN PERFORMANCE MARKETING
Body: Basically many ICO's choose to avoid US investors because at any time the SEC can step in and say its securities trading and cause huge legal and financial issues. The fact is the US says that if you want to trade in securities you have to be an accredited registered investor, makes it a big issue.  It comes down to is a token a security or not, and while its still a gray area i believe, many ICO's would rather forgo US investors, than risk the SEC's wrath.  It basically comes down to how much risk the ICO wants to take by allowing US members.

Author: BERMUDAL
Title: [ANN][ICO] CROM - TRANSPARENCY, TRUST AND LIQUIDITY IN PERFORMANCE MARKETING
Body: But don't you think we are not at that stadium yet? Crypto is fairly young and it isn't as adopted as many people here would love to believe. So to get to that stadium you should accept fiat currency until you the cryptoworld can stand on its own. Then and only then you can disavow fiat currency's otherwise you are just 'cutting in your own fingers' as we would say in the Netherlands. [/quote]   Of course this is a good point that bermudal addresses. Even though we often only think in terms of cryptocurrencies here, many others do not even know what an ethereum is. These would of course be easier to address with Fiat. But do these people even know that there is an ICO? that's just something out of the crypto world that they do not really know [/quote]  That's just the problem, 98% of all people have no significant knowledge of cryptocurrencies. That makes the potential of this market but also the danger. Unfortunately. Good that we are still at the beginning and we have the opportunity to take part in this trip. [/quote]  i see most negative factors as positive. They don't know alot about cryptocurrency's but do got the FOMO. By offering the fiat option you make it easy for them to buy the token. However, because they don't know alot about cryptocurrency's they are unable to easily dump said tokens. This would force this group to either hold their coin/token (good) or have them gain more knowledge about cryptocurrency to be able to dump (also good).  Either way you would expand the reach of cryptocurrency's

Author: BERMUDAL
Title: [ANN][ICO] CROM - TRANSPARENCY, TRUST AND LIQUIDITY IN PERFORMANCE MARKETING
Body: Haha thank you for demonstrating exactly my point! You put up some concernns, i address them with a explaination. Then u disregard the valid points i made and just claim the same thing you just said before (sold to noobs with no knowledge of crypto). Isn't that the whole point we are trying to reach? Getting crypto mainstream? I mean, there are alot of cars.. a select group knows how the combustion engine works but the mainstream people just know they have to put gas in it and it drives. People are not interested in how it works exactly, they expect it to be easy so they can get on with their lives.  So yes, for you it is not hard to buy ETH/BTC. But for most people it is too much of a hassle and they lose interest. As for me, i'm fine thank you. I got everything set up, but still it took me a long time to finally do it (back in 2014 already looked into buying bitcoin, looked to much of a hassle and let it go). <-- prime example of how people think. Therefor yes, i am still a noob and probably always will be in the cryptoworld but that means i got some outside perspective which you appearently refuse to acknowledge.  Beside the point, maybe it is simple not possible to accept fiat currency due to various reasons. Like i said, i am a noob and have no clue.

Author: phantam
Title: [ANN][ICO] CROM - TRANSPARENCY, TRUST AND LIQUIDITY IN PERFORMANCE MARKETING
Body: hes not wrong though, in regard to the cash vs crypto when it comes to restrictions from gov. But i could probably debate the merit, regardless of cash or crypto more and more governments are seeing crypto like cash assets hence why some ICO's are shying away from US residents, its a matter of time before more countries follow on.  All CROM and the others can do is try to color within the lines laid out by the governments, if that means crypto for crypto only when it comes to ICO's people will just have to learn to live with it. For the larger cryptos that are planned for corporate use or for financial instrument use its not a huge deal as middle men will find their way into the market to facilitate connecting people/businesses with the token/platforms they need. Or thats what i think.  For now the community will just have to work together to help people like yourself to understand the process and caveats (like not using exchange wallet for ICO's)

Author: msCROM

Maybe what he wanted to say is that "high quality ICOs" are only open for a few days because they get sold-out soo quickly.  But it's true that most of the contribution to the ICO happen right at the beginning, therefore a longer period doesn't always lead to a significant increase in the raised amount of ETH.

Author: trCROM
Title: [ANN][ICO] CROM - TRANSPARENCY, TRUST AND LIQUIDITY IN PERFORMANCE MARKETING
Body: Hi guys. On the discussion of token value, we thought long and hard. Sudden changes in value of the underlying ETH is not uncommon in ICOs, it's rather the norm. We anticipated a "return from BTC to ETH after the hard fork on Nov 17" and figured it would strengthen ETH. The BTC hard fork didn't come but the returning investor interest in ETH certainly did. As the pre-sale is underway, we can't change the token price anymore. A consideration we have right now: We could throw a bonus round (everybody get another xx% tokens on top of his purchase) later on if prices keep rising so sharply. Not decided yet, but certainly an option.

Author: phantam
Title: [ANN][ICO] CROM - TRANSPARENCY, TRUST AND LIQUIDITY IN PERFORMANCE MARKETING
Body: I think a lot of people jumping into crypto get confused between the whole token vs coin debacle. People still think Eth = Btc but in reality etherium isn't made to be used like bitcoin, i've been trying to explain to my friends and family that Etherium is basically just the platform for all these coins like CROM, it's there for handling transactions and transaction fees. Etherium doesn't advertise or look to get accepted at stores like bitcoin does. The advertising part and growing the community is up to coins like CROM. The people i've managed to get through understand and see how much potential etherium has.  CROM for instance has every interest to spread itself and advertise everywhere i can to help it's network grow which will help to grow etherium.  The downside is that it makes the whole "where do i buy X coin" harder to explain as you end up needing to explain they have to have etherium AND a token to really take advantage of the platform.

Author: phantam
Title: [ANN][ICO] CROM - TRANSPARENCY, TRUST AND LIQUIDITY IN PERFORMANCE MARKETING
Body: This is one of my main concerns when ICO prices are set in ETH instead of USD/EUR, as during the course of the ICO prices could drastically change, i mean its more controlled on Ethereum at the moment expectations are up to 25% before December, so a 25% higher cost price on crom might be a concern, but if you look at dash and bitcoin, the jumps are much more extreme even lately.  And on the flipside what happens if the floor falls out from the ethereum value, suddenly eth is worth 40$ instead of 400$ and because of that the ico is worth much less than when it was started.

Author: cryptossi
Title: [ANN][ICO] CROM - TRANSPARENCY, TRUST AND LIQUIDITY IN PERFORMANCE MARKETING
Body: Yeah the bonuses will have an advantage because you could argue that some people will only invest because of the 25% bonus, due to the nature of the ICO market. However, it can cause the coin to crash in price when it gets listed because people, will move their 'bonus' or 'bounty' tokens and dump them for a profit.  I saw Vitalik Buterin (co-founder of Ethereum) put up a tweet the other day saying that he disagrees that projects should offer bonuses during their ICO's because they dont understand 'the egalitarian spirit of crypto'. Which to me is a load of crap, I think bonuses are a great way of attracting new investors especially when it's a legit project like CROMHub .

Author: BERMUDAL
Title: [ANN][ICO] CROM - TRANSPARENCY, TRUST AND LIQUIDITY IN PERFORMANCE MARKETING
Body: once again i agree. Bonusses are a great way to attract investors. but the 25% is pretty modest compared to most ICO's where they offer 40% or even more, those bonus structures cause a big dip after listing. thats why im pretty optimistic about the 25% bonus.

Author: cryptossi
Title: [ANN][ICO] CROM - TRANSPARENCY, TRUST AND LIQUIDITY IN PERFORMANCE MARKETING
Body: I'm not sure, I think the biggest bonus I've received from an ICO is 25% and that was from the Change Coin (CAG) main sale.  At the time it seemed a bit too high to me, don't get me wrong it was great getting all the extra tokens for free, but I didn't really feel like I earned that bonus.  They were also offering up to 35% for the pre-ICO and it did work incredibly well for them, they raised around $17.5M USD in total and they ran the token sale for about a month.  It would be amazing if CROM could reach a similar level, I think with a bit more input from the marketing/advertising team with regard to facebook/twitter/youtube adverts and posts we could potentially reach it.  I would like to see a counter on the home page showing how much has been invested, that would be great and makes the project very transparent to it's investors.

Author: BaliScript
Title: [ANN][ICO] CROM - TRANSPARENCY, TRUST AND LIQUIDITY IN PERFORMANCE MARKETING
Body: After a closer look at the Crom whitepaper, I have a hard time understanding what Crom exactly will provide more than the Ethereum platform already does. As I understand it, they will use smart contracts in the advertisement industry, so that advertisers pay publishers with smart contracts.  Can someone explain me what Cromhub will do more than Ethereum platform already provides?

If you are interested in earning a very substantial amount of tokens this is your chance! Unlike similar programs there is no limits!  We want to reward you for spreading the word about the CROM ICO. Earn 2% of the amount invested from your affiliate links in CROM tokens.  Whenever a contribution is made by a person registered through your affiliate link the smart contract will send 2% on top of that contribution to your wallet address. So if somebody buys 100 tokens, we send another 2 to your wallet.  And let me repeat this: There is no limit! Also don't forget that there is a 25% bonus on tokens during the pre-ICO.  How To? Join the affiliate program at www.cromhub.com/bounty Enter your email and ether wallet address Click “Generate Affiliate Link” Share the link with your friends, community, neighbors, partners ...

Title: [ANN][ICO] CROM - TRANSPARENCY, TRUST AND LIQUIDITY IN PERFORMANCE MARKETING
Body: We have built a 4-year plan which brings us to 15-18m EUR direct contribution/year. That is "cash", that CROMhub gets as fees for its services. The media spend being pumped through the system is much much higher.

Author: trCROM
Title: [ANN][ICO] CROM - TRANSPARENCY, TRUST AND LIQUIDITY IN PERFORMANCE MARKETING
Body: Hi, I agree there are a sizable number of advertising-related [Suspicious link removed]panies out there. What makes us different, is our "hands-on approach". We will develop new technology first for the main pain-points: trust in tracking and settlement. And there, first for the performance advertising market. We strive to establish the technology, the brand, the business relations and take it from there. It is our belief, that this approach has a higher chance of success than the truly revolutionary approaches of some other start-ups.

Author: trCROM
Title: [ANN][ICO] CROM - TRANSPARENCY, TRUST AND LIQUIDITY IN PERFORMANCE MARKETING
Body: sure yield inc limited 順研有限公司 is the company behind the project, it is in Hong Kong. Don't be mistaken, though, the team is truly international. Most team members work together face-to-face in Berlin, Germany.

Title: [ANN][ICO] CROM - TRANSPARENCY, TRUST AND LIQUIDITY IN PERFORMANCE MARKETING
Body: Today marks a huge step in meeting our goal to have CROM freely tradable after Christmas. Solid KYC/AML procedures are mandatory for exchanges being able to accept any token and we are happy to announce our partnership with the reowned compliance platform Coinfirm.io. With Coinfirm.io's technology we ensure that the CROMhub ICO will be thouroughly checked for compliance while avoiding an overcomplicated signup flow.  Sign up today for the pre-sale and get a 25% bonus: http://www.CROMhub.com

Author: msCROM
Title: [ANN][ICO] CROM - TRANSPARENCY, TRUST AND LIQUIDITY IN PERFORMANCE MARKETING
Body: Hello from Berlin! Let me answer some more questions here.     We are an international team of people working in the digital marketing space for 15+ years. Our firsthand experience with the problems of the industy is what drove the development of this project.  Quote from: lina.potushanskaya.84 on November 04, 2017, 02:18:28 PM Will be the number of tokens  decrease?  No, the number of token will stay the same. First priority is launching the platform with B2B partners to increase demand for tokens. Next we will facilitate the lending of tokens on the platform. Lastly we might buy back tokens to further increase demand.  Quote from: veranika55 on November 04, 2017, 08:05:52 PM You have a russian thread on bitcointalk. Do you plan to translate site in russian?  The website will be available in RU very soon.  Quote from: veranika55 on November 05, 2017, 09:48:23 AM Soft cap: 8,000 ETH (= 1m CROM) = $2 400 000. It is a very big sum. What will be if soft cup will not be reached?  If the ICO does not reach the soft cap, the invested ETH can be claimed back.

Author: msCROM
Title: [ANN][ICO] CROM - TRANSPARENCY, TRUST AND LIQUIDITY IN PERFORMANCE MARKETING
Body: Hello from Berlin! I hope you have a nice weekend. Again, thank you for your questions and the nice words. As promised I want to answer more questions.     Quote from: Moore787 on November 04, 2017, 09:35:25 AM Will it be possible to sell tokens immediately after .ico?  Realistically just after Christmas. As the ICO ends Dec 15, we might run into the Christmas break for some exchanges‘ tech teams.  Quote from: Asalar on November 03, 2017, 03:52:44 PM Will there be a separate partner network on Youtube?  CROMhub runs independent from the places were advertising is shown. If a future business partner of CROMhub choses to run Youtube ads, it will work just fine.  Quote from: P.Krymov on November 03, 2017, 03:56:47 PM Will there be personal partnership offers for owners of large portals?  Owners of large portals are invited to join the pre-sale. We look forward to hearing from them, discuss their needs and requirements and make CROMhub even more fit for their business.  Quote from: derverss on November 03, 2017, 06:59:05 PM Do you negotiate with Poloniex about the listing of the tokens?  Yes, we do. But we can’t tell you yet, whether they will decide to list us.  Quote from: AshdiD22 on November 03, 2017, 08:29:23 PM I would like to participate in your ICO company. Can I buy your tockens for Bytecoin? The token will not be used to pay the platform fees but represend an irrevocable fee advantage when using the platform. There are two stages depending on your friends/followers.  700-2000 friends/follower: 2 CROM above 2000 friends/follower: 4 CROM  Please find all additional details in the official bounty threads. Author: msCROM
Title: [ANN][ICO] CROM - TRANSPARENCY, TRUST AND LIQUIDITY IN PERFORMANCE MARKETING
Body: First of all let me say thanks for all the nice words and your questions! Since my account is still limited to one post every 360 seconds I will answer a couple of questions at the same time.     Excellent question. Blockchain has two big advantages: it’s a transparent and fake-proof ledger; and (in form of Ethereum and comparable newer manifestations) it can host and execute smart contracts. This makes it the perfect choice for tracking (which needs to be proven, transparent, fault-proof – nobody wants to get cheated) and settlement (initializing payment from A to B, once certain criteria are met). Not all processes in the marketing industry are suited for blockchain adaptation. RTB requires to much processing power, banners just dont need to be there… but tracking and settlement fit perfectly. That’s why we are concentrating on bringing these two crusical processes to the blockchain.  Quote from: Kpss_pro on November 03, 2017, 05:40:00 PM Which directions will be investment mainly spent on  The funds collected will provide operating capital for four years. The majority will be spent on technology and platform development. Business development will also be a considerable cost factor. Currently we expect them the funds to be spend like this:  https://www.cromhub.com/static/use-of-funds.2142a9ae.png  Quote from: stalin2517 on November 03, 2017, 05:54:33 PM Can I buy your tokens for the DASH crypto currency?  No, currently we don't have plans to accept any other currency but ETHER during the ICO.  Quote from: Lina_Malina on November 03, 2017, 05:58:55 PM May I buy less than one token?  No, 1 Token (0.01 ETH) will be the smallest unit you can buy.   The following questions have been forwarded to the rest of the team and will be answered with the next batch!  Quote from: alexsmalex on November 03, 2017, 03:37:06 PM When will the token be added to the stock exchanges?  Quote from: Asalar on November 03, 2017, 03:52:44 PM Will there be a separate partner network on Youtube?  Quote from: P.Krymov on November 03, 2017, 03:56:47 PM Will there be personal partnership offers for owners of large portals?  Quote from: Mix_Fix on November 03, 2017, 06:11:36 PM Can we pay  tokens by transfer from the rialto?  Quote from: derverss on November 03, 2017, 06:59:05 PM Do you negotiate with Poloniex about the listing of the tokens?  Quote from: oficman on November 03, 2017, 07:22:52 PM How can you speed up the process of processing transactions?

Author: msCROM
Title: [ANN][ICO] CROM - TRANSPARENCY, TRUST AND LIQUIDITY IN PERFORMANCE MARKETING
Body: We would like to introduce you to  CROM, a blockchain based transaction platform for the digital advertising industry.  Registration for pre-sale is now open. Hurry to grab a 25% bonus on CROM tokens.  The CROM bounties are announced! Check them out!  We are an international team of experienced people working in the digital marketing space. We are based in Berlin, Germany. In our 15+ years journey in the industry, we were always faced with the challenges and flaws the established processes and business setups in that industry have. There are recurring problems with payments, trust and liquidity. We visualized some of this "mess" on our CROM website.  While constantly looking for ways to improve this situation, we turned our attention to blockchain based transaction handling about 15 months ago. We started to model a modern payment implementation based on the growing acceptance of crypto currencies and its efficient payment mechanics. Ethereum-based smart contracts are the foundation from which to build. And from here it really started.   This is how we imagine an efficient transaction handling should work. This is CROM.  We started shaping and proving our plan by getting valuable information from industry leaders both from the advertiser and publisher side, and we gathered a lot of valuable inputs and interest from blockchain enthusiasts. Then the ICO train came along and provided a great way to accelerate our progress. So, we decided to jump on this opportunity and here we are.   Watch the video!  This our ICO ANN thread at bitcointalk. Obviously, our company related accounts on this board are a little too young to have reached a junior account here that allows us to insert pictures (for now) in our post, but trust us – we are old guys when it comes to industry experience. And yes, we do have visuals, please visit our website https://cromhub.com  Of course we are not only here to present the project, but we will be available to discuss our project with you. Feel free to ask us anything in this thread or join the discussion in our Telegram group at  Telegram: https://t.me/joinchat/ANhBikDwg9pQ6EEepGDJ2Q   THE MISSION  The market:  The overall digital advertising market turns over $500B/year. This can eventually be addressed by CROM. Initially, we will work within the $6.8B/year performance marketing ecosystem.  How we are going to do it:  CROM is the first real-world application of blockchain technology for the performance advertising industry. We build a service that takes event tracking into the blockchain, connects tracked events to payouts and forwards payouts along the value chain.  CROM is designed to work alongside existing processes and can easily be linked to existing platforms. Everything is geared towards low barriers for adoption. Our team of advisors is carefully chosen to give us deep roots in the digital advertising industry. This allows us to develop the platform in close cooperation with the future clients.  CROM grants access to a complete new set of methods that will fundamentally change the way settlements are processed in the digital advertising value chain. Now that blockchain technology has reached a more mature state, CROM takes advantage of the solutions available and combines smart contracts with cryptocurrency based payment.  CROM is tailored to the digital performance advertisement industry and solves problems that all current implementations cannot cope with.  Find out more at https://cromhub.com/   THE FACTS & THE TIMELINE  Token name: CROM What do the Tokens represent? These tokens represent an irrevocable fee advantage in using the Companies’ services in the future. Total supply There will be a fixed supply of 10.0m tokens; no more tokens will be created by the Smart Contract. 6.0m tokens (60%) thereof will be sold during the ICO. Distribution 2.0m tokens during a pre-ICO to early investors with a 25% bonus. 4.0m tokens during the public ICO at nominal rate. ICO time and duration: The ICO will start Dec 01, 2017, 12:00 GMT and last for 14 days or until all CROM tokens are sold – whichever happens earlier. The pre-ICO will start Nov 17, 2017, 12:00 GMT and will last for 14 days. CROM token price: 0.01 ETH (1 ETH = 100 CROM) Soft cap: 8,000 ETH (= 1m CROM) Hard cap: 56,000 ETH (= 6m CROM) Unsold tokens: If the soft cap is reached, but there are still CROM tokens unsold after 14 days, these CROM tokens are transferred to the company wallet. Tradability: We intend to make the CROM tokens tradable on popular exchanges within three weeks after the ICO ends.   THIS IS US  CROMhub is build by sure yield inc limited 順研有限公司, a Hong Kong based company. While our employees and advisors are based around the world, the main development center is in Berlin, Germany. You can find us at the Factory Berlin, Rheinsberger Str. 76/77, 10115 Berlin  We are a team of 11 people from 6 countries. We are mostly based in Berlin, Germany.  Core Team: Thomas Kothuis, Chief Executive Officer Dominik Rachwal, Chief Technology Officer Thomas Richter, Project Lead Konrad Tysiac, Lead Blockchain Developer Robert Bochenski, Blockchain Architekt Phil Rukin, Developer Matthias Kirsch, Lead Business Development Chris Bisset, Business Intelligence Christian Hullena, Lead Design Matti Seidel, Communications Janine Henning, Finance   OUR ADVISORS  Christoph Vilanek CEO at Freenet AG; Chairman of the Board for Ströer Media, mobilkom-debitel, Exaring; member advisory board for Gamigo AG and Webtrekk  Lorenzo Green CEO iStack Holdings, Founder of Affiliate World Conferences, Co-Founder & CEO Monetizer, Co-Founder Kobi Digital  Niren Hiro Silicon Valley investor; CrowdStar, AdMob, Yahoo!, CBS Sportsline, MTV Networks   And of course, here is our whitepaper! (https://cromhub.com/CROMwhitepaper.pdf)

Author: Fu.Sin
Title: [ANN][ICO] CROM - TRANSPARENCY, TRUST AND LIQUIDITY IN PERFORMANCE MARKETING
Body: There is a very large number of advertising agencies in the world. There is too much advertising on the Internet. At first, it is very annoying, then the instinct of self-preservation works and it ceases to notice. And that's the problem of advertising effectiveness. It is necessary, on the one hand, not to be unnecessarily intrusive, and on the other hand, to be able to be interested. What is the advantage of your project?

Author: mkcrom
Title: [ANN][ICO] CROM - TRANSPARENCY, TRUST AND LIQUIDITY IN PERFORMANCE MARKETING
Body: Thanks for pointing this out. With CROM we address a few real-world challenges in our industry. And liquidity is a big one for the whole value chain. We think that CROM is the smartest solution for this problem and also best for a well-established industry with existing platforms, network setups etc. Because CROMhub.com itself is a service that will work together with and alongside existing tracking platforms.  There are other ad-tech ICOs in the past months have promised "new eco-systems". With CROM we aim differently: using blockchain technology only where and when it makes sense within crucial parts of the existing industry. Everything is geared for low barriers of adoption, quick uptake of the solution and sustained growth.    mkcorm

Author: trCROM
Title: [ANN][ICO] CROM - TRANSPARENCY, TRUST AND LIQUIDITY IN PERFORMANCE MARKETING
Body: We have a different model: Advertisers and Publishers in digital marketing will need the token to run their campaigns on CROMhub efficiently. You can sell to them for a quick winning. If you want to hold, the platform will have a lending mechanism much like some of the large exchanges - lend your tokens to people who need them and receive a perpetual return; like a dividend on stocks.

Author: trCROM
Title: [ANN][ICO] CROM - TRANSPARENCY, TRUST AND LIQUIDITY IN PERFORMANCE MARKETING
Body: Hi. Thanks for the support. We are working hard to make this happen.  To your questions: Soft Cap is 8,000 ETH. Max. Contribution - we deliberately did not set a limit. Whales are very rare these days... The pre-ICO will carry a 25% bonus. So, however many tokens you buy, you get 25% on top. Let's say you contribute 1 ETH, you will receive 100 + 25 = 125 tokens. This is true for the first 2m tokens.  There is a Bounty Program here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2350279 Check back here or join our Telegram Group: https://t.me/CROMhub  Best regards, Thomas
